title: Information Literacy Formation Assessment-Based Training Program for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and academic resource utilization experience
context.additional_context: A language specialization course for working professionals conducted primarily on mobile devices in non-PC environments, incorporating formative assessments beyond traditional summative evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more relevant keywords and synonyms for a given research topic
Learners can evaluate the appropriateness of search strategies through the process of analyzing information needs
Learners can correct over 80% of errors in the information-seeking process through mobile-based worksheet activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
